|ConceptDef.helpText=You can configure stockpiles and storage buildings by selecting them and opening the STORAGE TAB above the bottom-left inspector pane.<br/><br/>In the storage tab of a stockpile, you can expand categories to allow or deny specific items. Click the triangles to the left of category names.<br/><br/>You can change the PRIORITY of storage. Colonists will fill higher-priority storage first, and move items from lower to higher priority.
|ConceptDef.helpText.zh-cn=你可以通过点击储存区或者仓库面板左下角的「储存筛选」按钮来进行详细设置。<br/><br/>你可以扩大/减少该储存区允许堆放的物品种类。<br/><br/>也可以更改当前区域的「优先级」，殖民者总是会优先向优先级更高的储存区和仓库搬运东西。
|ConceptDef.helpText.zh-tw=你可以透過選擇儲存區和儲存建築並開啟在觀察面板上方的儲存選單來自訂它們的儲存設置。
